text: Dame Carol Ann Duffy DBE (born 23 December 1955) is a Scottish poet and playwright. She was born in the Gorbals, Glasgow and moved to Stafford when she was six.Encycolpaedia Britannica On 1 May 2009 she was appointed Britain's poet laureate. She is the first female British poet laureate, as well as being the first Scottish and first openly LGBT one. She was awarded an OBE in 1995, a CBE in 2002, and was made a dame (DBE) in 2015. == References == Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:British playwrights Category:British poets laureate Category:LGBT playwrights Category:LGBT poets Category:People from Staffordshire
title: Carol Ann Duffy
